code_repairing_4:
There are a few options to travel to Scotland:

- Drive, you can easily drive from London to Scotland, with the typical driving time being around 8 hours
- Take the train, you can take the train from London to Scotland, with the typical travel time being around 9 hours.
- Take the plane, you can take a direct flight from London to Edinburgh which takes around an hour.
- Sail, you can sail from Southampton to Edinburgh which takes around 12 hours.

Whatever option you choose I'm sure you will enjoy your trip to Scotland
